articles.author: Vincent Manancourt
articles.title: Vestager vs. Cook: New Apple charges reignite old standoff - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Apple’s CEO called the EU’s €13B tax case ‘political crap.’ Now Europe’s competition czar is going after the App Store.
articles.content:
Its personal. Again. 
Less than a year after her court defeat over a 13 billion case against Apple, the EU's top antitrust enforcer Margrethe Vestager is once again taking aim at the iPhone maker.
… [+3516 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Spain extends AstraZeneca dose gap to 16 weeks, beyond EU approved limit - Reuters
articles.description: Spain is extending the gap between the first and second doses of AstraZeneca's (AZN.L) COVID-19 vaccine to 16 weeks for people aged under 60, the government said on Friday, going beyond the 12-week maximum interval approved by European authorities.

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Super League club executives resign from Premier League committees - The Star Online
articles.description: (Reuters) -     Executives from five of the six English clubs involved in the controversial breakaway European Super League have resigned from their posts on various Premier League committees, Sky Sports reported on Thursday.

articles.title: Europe's Vega rocket successfully launches - News24
articles.description: Europe's Vega rocket took off overnight Wednesday from French Guiana with Earth observation satellites on board, six months after losing two satellites.
articles.content:
Europe's Vega rocket took off overnight Wednesday from French Guiana with Earth observation satellites on board, six months after losing two satellites.
